about_the_game:
The Purgatory DLC delivers three new songs, a new weapon, and three searing new looks.

Don the skin that reflects the fire within, then ride the demonic voices of Matt Heafy (Trivium), Melissa Bonny (Ad Infinitum), and Joe Bad (Fit for an Autopsy) as you punctuate each beat with your infernal bow.

The Purgatory DLC contains:

Three new songs

  • Goodbye My Morning Star performed by Matt Heafy (Trivium)
  • Swallow the Fire performed by Melissa Bonny (Ad Infinitum)
  • Mouth of Hell performed by Joe Bad (Fit for an Autopsy)

New Weapon: Telos

  • Slay demons with arrows from a powerful bow.
  • Deal extra headshot damage and charge up your shots.
  • Pick up fired arrows to shoot without pause.

New Cosmetic Skins

  • Obsidian
  • Amethyst
  • Chromatica
